DOC.detailed_description: Traditionally , manual palpation lower back used identify skin insertion point epidural needle placement obstetric patient . Recently , two-dimensional ultrasound ( 2D US ) scan epidural needle insertion prove improve accurate determination inter-vertebral level spine midline . 2D US also useful determine depth epidural space needle insertion angle . A three-dimensional ultrasound ( 3D US ) technique new advancement ultrasound technology . 3D US allows real-time , visual guidance epidural needle insertion . This study assess weather 3D US , compare palpation , accurately identify skin needle insertion site epidural needle placement .
